display_long_description:
-- Full Release Celebration! Get 40% OFF with code 40-B1E7C4 until the end of the month --

In the near future, Earth lies in ruins, and undead corpses are the only beings walking the streets once populated by humans. Survive in a post-apocalyptic world and take down as many undead as you can before they get you

We're thrilled to announce the release of our major Update Version 4.3
-  Real Dynamic Shadows!!!
-We've boosted the resolution by 63%, from 90% to 153%
- Enjoy Near-4K Visuals!
- Smooth motion and framerate
-New 120 FPS Option (for quest 3+)
- Vibrant Foliage
-New Anti-aliasing Options System
-Eye Tracking Support
- Free Movement
- 14 Weapons
- 3 Maps
- 16 Zombies
- Wordwide Leaderboards
- Survival mode
- Latest Gen Graphics and FX (4 GEN) 
- Snap turning and  Smooth Turning,
- Movable lights
- Dual Weapons

-NOTE: You can play the game offline, but an internet connection is required to submit your score.

-Join our team discord here:  https://discord.gg/bJKPK7UH
